page.title: 01An Introduction to our area
page.content: This area of{Solihull}is rapidly changing. New{housing}and{industry}are rapidly taking over the once-open countryside. The{landscape}is fairly flat, with many varieties of well established trees, and builders are continuing to plant new trees in the new housing estates. The council have reclaimed the old tip on Monkspath Road into new park land. There are a few farms where animals are grazed but not much arable farming. New industrial estates have been built,bringing many employers to the area, but the character of the area is still largely residential.Houses range from pre-war to modern estates still under construction. A new school, shops and a clinic are planned to cater for these.
